mapper.sql: id, city, source_type, product, dangw, mig_id, rd_user, count, sec_time, state, add_time, isdelblack, deldays, isitmework, worktime, isdeldays, re_user
mapper.select:
select
from tb_review
and rd_user like '%' #{keyword} '%'
AND add_time like '${keyid}%'
AND state=#{keystate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_review (id, city, source_type, product, dangw, mig_id, rd_user, count, sec_time, state, add_time, isdelblack, deldays, isitmework, worktime, isdeldays, re_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dangw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{migId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelblack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deldays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isitmework,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeldays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_review
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dangw = #{dangw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mig_id = #{migId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rd_user = #{rdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

worktime = #{worktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdeldays = #{isdeldays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re_user = #{reUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
